articles.description: Tony-winning “Hamilton” actor Leslie Odom Jr. gets candid about thoughtfully originating Aaron Burr, and the lack of diversity and profit-sharing in the theater industry.
articles.content: Eight times a week, for a solid year, Leslie Odom Jr. battled it out on Broadway with Hamilton composer and star Lin-Manuel Miranda. Odom ended up with the lead actor Tony for his work as the blockbu… [+12553 chars]

articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: Disney is postponing the reopening of Disneyland - CNN
articles.description: Disney is delaying the phased reopening of Disneyland and Disney California Adventure, the company's flagship theme parks in California, the company said on Wednesday.
